title: Micheál Martin - Wikipedia
snippet: In the 2024 general election, Fianna Fáil achieved the most seats in the Dáil; Martin was appointed as Taoiseach in January 2025 after a new coalition government was formed.

title: Micheal Martin returns as Irish prime minister | Politics News | Al Jazeera
snippet: Fianna Fail leader Micheal Martin ... · Share · Save · Micheal Martin has been elected as the Republic of Ireland’s prime minister for a second time....

title: The Irish Times view on Micheál Martin’s leadership: secure, for now
snippet: Next month he will mark 15 years as party leader. He is also positioned to play a prominent role on the European stage when Ireland assumes the EU presidency in the latter half of 2026.

title: Micheál Martin: Backbench TDs call for discussion over Irish PM's leadership

title: Micheál Martin vows to protect Ireland ‘at moment of real threat’ | Ireland | The Guardian
snippet: In a repeat of the novel rotating taoiseach deal Harris’s predecessor Leo Varadkar had struck with Fianna Fáil, Martin will remain in his new role for three years, with Harris taking over in November 2027.
